amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part D of House Report 119-399 to require the GAO to conduct a review of existing IRP processes and whether states are considering reliable generation in their portfolios.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore (WV) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the bill and the amendment pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore (WV) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
